title: Imran Khan
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation and John E. Bodnar
brief_description: Imran Khan, the Tiger of Pakistan, was born into a famous cricketing family and became the most inspirational cricketer of his generation. From his early days at Oxford to his full test career with Pakistan, he has experienced unparralleled success as a genuine all-rounder. His test career, spanning three decades, has seen him develop from a precocious talent to a father-like figure exuding respect and experience. Features highlights of his playing career including his many records and achievements.
